content:
the evening you left I drove to visit you. took me 18 hours, so I didn't get to see you. 
I wish that you see, now and later, how we are doing. brilliant ideas, fascinating creations, and among all, lifetimes well lived. 
I wish, that there is purpose in our lives, that there is hope in this universe, that in the darkness spanning across infinite time, our little sparks can still shine a light. 
see you when this ends.
